name: Typing of the Dreamland
description:
Follow the adventures of Keine, solving yet another mysterious incident in Gensokyo.

Use your typing skills to defeat your opponents and put an end to the evil plans of ██████████.

Made by:

  • JonathKane
  • Archivist
  • Enalye
  • Wodkanna

DISCLAIMER: The Hotfix version was published 10~20min late because of a game-breaking bug (a crash caused by a missing asset). The game is the same as the first download but the first submission will crash after a certain scene.
